basic.description: Research courses given at either the Fields Institute in Toronto, or the Centre de recherches mathématiques (CRM) in Montreal, can be used to discharge the course requirements for master's or doctoral degrees.  Such credit must be applied for in advance with the Coordinator of Graduate Studies, with the agreement of the supervisor. Grades are assigned on a PASS - FAIL basis.
basic.subject: MATH
basic.title: Fields Or Crm Course
